title: Video: Youth Lagoon – Dropla (Pitchfork.tv Session)
content:
Despite being unceremoniously cut after only two songs at the Pitchfork SXSW day party (due to time constraints, not quality), there’s no doubting the support that Pitchfork have provided Youth Lagoon throughout his blossoming career. This latest session of recent album track Dropla not only serves to mend some bridges, but also to complete the expansion of Youth Lagoon, from a timid, understated performer to a group of musicians fully capable of wowing stadium sized crowds. Check out Dropla performed exclusively for Pitchfork.tv, as well as three UK tour dates presented by Now Wave, after the jump.

MONDAY 15th JULY
LEEDS BRUDENELL SOCIAL CLUB
TUESDAY 16th JULY
MANCHESTER GORILLA
THURSDAY 18th JULY
BIRMINGHAM HARE AND HOUNDS
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
